titleStmt.title: The speech and declaration of His Excellency the Lord Generall Monck delivered at White-hall upon Tuesday the 21. of February 1659. To the Members of Parliament at their meeting there, before the re-admission of the formerly secluded Members into the Parliament House. Ordered by his Excellency the Lord Generall that this speech and declaration be forthwith printed and published. Will: Clark secretary. Entred in the Stationers Hall according to order.
titleStmt.author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.

titleStmt.title: The speech and declaration of His Excellency the Lord Generall Monck delivered at White-hall upon Tuesday the 21. of February 1659. To the Members of Parliament at their meeting there, before the re-admission of the formerly secluded Members into the Parliament House. Ordered by his Excellency the Lord Generall that this speech and declaration be forthwith printed and published. Will: Clark secretary. Entred in the Stationers Hall according to order.
titleStmt.author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by S. Griffin, for John Playford at his shop in the Temple near the Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
